title: Seasons of Waiting: A Pride and Prejudice Variation
description: Autumn, 1812: Certain his second proposal will be rejected, Darcy does not return to Hertfordshireâ€“or to Elizabeth Bennet.Spring, 1837: When his nephew falls in love with her niece, Darcy and Elizabeth are bound to meet again.How many steps does it take to find a way back to the person you have always loved?Dear Readers: this book contains a few non-graphic references to rape and incest.
author: Christina Morland
